qas.question: Who provides emergency care in the city of Paris?
How many people are employed at AP-HP?
How many hospitals are in Paris?
How many patients visit the hospitals annually?

context: Health care and emergency medical service in the city of Paris and its suburbs are provided by the <a0_0>Assistance publique - Hôpitaux de Paris<a0_0/> (AP-HP), a public hospital system that employs more than <a1_0>90,000<a1_0/> people (including practitioners, support personnel, and administrators) in <a2_0>44<a2_0/> hospitals. It is the largest hospital system in Europe. It provides health care, teaching, research, prevention, education and emergency medical service in 52 branches of medicine. The hospitals receive more than <a3_0>5.8 million<a3_0/> annual patient visits.
